PERSONA:
Name: Ethan Thompson

Race: White

Location: Cheyenne, Wyoming (state capital, with a mix of urban and rural influences)

Household Structure: Single male with two children (7-year-old daughter, Emma, and 4-year-old son, Liam) from a previous relationship. The mother has visitation rights but does not contribute financially.

Career: Janitorial Supervisor at a local school district (Cheyenne School District #1), earning $29,500 annually. Works 40 hours a week, with benefits, including private health insurance.

Employment History: Started working in janitorial services right after high school, working his way up from a part-time janitor to a full-time supervisor over the past 7 years.

Economic Concerns: Balancing childcare costs with saving for his children's education and ensuring job security, as school district budgets can be unpredictable.

Citizenship: US-born citizen, with deep roots in Wyoming.

Veteran Status: Non-Veteran.

Insurance Coverage: Has private health insurance through his employer.

In summary, Ethan is a 29-year-old single father of two, working as a Janitorial Supervisor in Cheyenne, Wyoming. He is the primary breadwinner for his household and faces economic challenges related to childcare costs, job security, and saving for his children's education.
